languages.text: "Нужды на то нет, Домин'{name}. Приказ госпо{mf|дина|жи} несет истину, не опасность". {n}Старик кротко склоняет голову, безоружные тощие руки безвольно висят вдоль тела.{/n}
"There is no need for them, Domin'{name}. The word of the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark begets truth, not danger." {n}He gives you a meek nod, his thin, unarmed hands hanging limply at his sides.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Нужды на то нет, Домин'{name}. Приказ госпо{mf|дина|жи} несет истину, не опасность". {n}Старик кротко склоняет голову, безоружные тощие руки безвольно висят вдоль тела.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "There is no need for them, Enim'{name}. The word of the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark begets truth, not danger." {n}He gives you a meek nod, his thin, unarmed hands hanging limply at his sides.{/n}
"There is no need for them, Enim'{name}. The word of the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark begets truth, not danger." {n}He gives you a meek nod, his thin, unarmed hands hanging limply at his sides.{/n}
"There is no need for them, Enim'{name}. The word of the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark begets truth, not danger." {n}He gives you a meek nod, his thin, unarmed hands hanging limply at his sides.{/n}
"There is no need for them, Enim'{name}. The word of the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark begets truth, not danger." {n}He gives you a meek nod, his thin, unarmed hands hanging limply at his sides.{/n}
"There is no need for them, Domin'{name}. The word of the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark begets truth, not danger." {n}He gives you a meek nod, his thin, unarmed hands hanging limply at his sides.{/n}
"There is no need for them, Domin'{name}. The word of the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark begets truth, not danger." {n}He gives you a meek nod, his thin, unarmed hands hanging limply at his sides.{/n}

languages.text: «No son necesarias, Domin'{name}. La palabra de{mf|l señor| la señora} del Arca engendra verdad, no peligro». {n}Te ofrece una reverencia obediente, con sus manos delgadas y desarmadas colgando a ambos lados de su cuerpo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There is no need for them, Domin'{name}. The word of the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark begets truth, not danger." {n}He gives you a meek nod, his thin, unarmed hands hanging limply at his sides.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No son necesarias, Domin'{name}. La palabra de{mf|l señor| la señora} del Arca engendra verdad, no peligro». {n}Te ofrece una reverencia obediente, con sus manos delgadas y desarmadas colgando a ambos lados de su cuerpo.{/n}

languages.text: 「そんなものは必要ない、ドミン・{name}。陛下の箱舟の言葉は真実を生み、危険は生まない」{n}男は静かにうなずき、細い両手を横にダランとたらす。{/n}
languages.original_text: "There is no need for them, Domin'{name}. The word of the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark begets truth, not danger." {n}He gives you a meek nod, his thin, unarmed hands hanging limply at his sides.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そんなものは必要ない、エニム・{name}。陛下の箱舟の言葉は真実を生み、危険は生まない」{n}男は静かにうなずき、細い両手を横にダランとたらす。{/n}

languages.text: “没必要道歉，秘者{name}。方舟之主的话语从不会带来危险，只会带来真理。”{n}他恭顺地点点头，瘦削的双手没有握着任何武器，无力地垂在身体两侧。{/n}
languages.original_text: "There is no need for them, Domin'{name}. The word of the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark begets truth, not danger." {n}He gives you a meek nod, his thin, unarmed hands hanging limply at his sides.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “没必要道歉，秘者{name}。方舟之主的话语从不会带来危险，只会带来真理。”{n}他恭顺地点点头，瘦削的双手没有握着任何武器，无力地垂在身体两侧。{/n}

languages.text: "Sie sind nicht nötig, Domin'{name}. Das Wort {mf|des Lords|der Lady} der Arche erzeugt Wahrheit, nicht Gefahr." {n}Er nickt dir schwach zu. Seine dünnen, unbewaffneten Hände hängen schlaff herab.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There is no need for them, Domin'{name}. The word of the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark begets truth, not danger." {n}He gives you a meek nod, his thin, unarmed hands hanging limply at his sides.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sie sind nicht nötig, Domin'{name}. Das Wort {mf|des Lords|der Lady} der Arche erzeugt Wahrheit, nicht Gefahr." {n}Er nickt dir schwach zu. Seine dünnen, unbewaffneten Hände hängen schlaff herab.{/n}

languages.text: « C'est inutile, Domin'{name}. La parole {mf|du seigneur|de la maîtresse} de l'Arche est mère de vérité, et non pas de danger. » {n}Il opine docilement du chef, ses fines mains désarmées ballantes de part et d'autre de son corps.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There is no need for them, Domin'{name}. The word of the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark begets truth, not danger." {n}He gives you a meek nod, his thin, unarmed hands hanging limply at his sides.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « C'est inutile, Domin'{name}. La parole {mf|du seigneur|de la maîtresse} de l'Arche est mère de vérité, et non pas de danger. » {n}Il opine docilement du chef, ses fines mains désarmées ballantes de part et d'autre de son corps.{/n}

languages.text: "Özre gerek yok Domin'{name}. Ark'ın {mf|Lordu'nun|Leydisi'nin} ağzından çıkan sözler, tehlikeye değil hakikate yol açar." {n}Uysal bir şekilde başını eğiyor. Silahsız, incecik elleri; her iki yanında da gevşekçe sallanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There is no need for them, Domin'{name}. The word of the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark begets truth, not danger." {n}He gives you a meek nod, his thin, unarmed hands hanging limply at his sides.{/n}
